# init(rootRecord:shareID:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new share for the specified record and record ID.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rootRecord: CKRecord, shareID: CKRecord.ID)
```

## Parameters

- **rootRecord**: The record to share.
- **shareID**: The [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/ID] for the share.

## Discussion

When saving a newly created [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare], save the share and its [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare/Metadata/rootRecord] in the same [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifyRecordsOperation] batch.

## Creating a Share

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a share from a serialized instance.
- **init(rootRecord:)**: Creates a new share for the specified record.
- **init(recordZoneID:)**: Creates a new share for the specified record zone.
